title: Jujutsu Kaisen
description: Jujutsu Kaisen follows Yuji Itadori, a high school student who joins a secret organization of Jujutsu Sorcerers after accidentally becoming the host of a powerful curse named Ryomen Sukuna. In a world filled with cursed spirits and dangerous sorcery, Itadori must learn to control his abilities while fighting alongside his fellow sorcerers to protect humanity from supernatural threats.
